import React, {Component,Fragment} from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import {Helmet} from 'react-helmet'; class Instructions extends React.Component{ render(){ return( Quiz Instructions

Rules

Ensure you read this guide from start to finish

  • The game has a duration 15 minutes and ends as soon as your time elapases
  • Each game consist of 15 questions
  • Every question contains 4 options.
  • Select the option which best answers the question by clicking (or selecting) it.
